tool_description: Query a database of over 2 million Chess Puzzles

api_list.name: Puzzles
api_list.description: The main access point for the API to retrieve a list of chess puzzles.

optional_parameters.name: themesType
optional_parameters.description: Type of themes to filter puzzles.

optional_parameters.name: rating
optional_parameters.description: Minimum rating of the puzzles to retrieve.

optional_parameters.name: playerMoves
optional_parameters.description: Number of moves the player has made in the puzzle.

api_list.name: Puzzle by Id
api_list.description: Gets a single puzzle by its unique ID.

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: The unique identifier of the puzzle to retrieve.
